request.description: Fetches all transfer histories. Note that deposits and withdrawal are not included.
The current balance of the bank account will be returned.
This endpoint transfers money from one account to another
This endpoint deposits money into an account
This endpoint helps to withdraw monry from an account
This resource fetches all the list of bank accounts.
